医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
识别风险和解决方案：研究揭示了预防 COVID-19 的相关性研究确定了接受三剂辉瑞 BNT162b2 疫苗的健康个体的保护相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Identifying-risks-and-solutions-study-uncovers-correlates-of-protection-against-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Identifying-risks-and-solutions-study-uncovers-correlates-of-protection-against-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3e9e863-0533-435a-9447-2a8cb391bc32 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 11:00:00 -0400 Identifying risks and solutions: study uncovers correlates of protection against COVID-19
类肽抗病毒疗法在实验室测试中灭活了三种病毒正如细菌可以产生抗生素耐药性一样，病毒也可以逃避药物治疗。开发针对这些微生物的疗法很困难，因为病毒经常变异或隐藏在细胞内。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Peptoid-antiviral-therapy-inactivates- Three-viruses-in-lab-tests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Peptoid-antiviral-therapy-inactivates- Three-viruses-in-lab-tests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b75b0dd7-f305-4417-af6a-d314e84eb9fb Wed, 02 Aug 2023 10:45:24 -0400 Peptoid antiviral therapy inactivates three viruses in lab tests
对于不运动的成年人来说，剧烈的间歇性体力活动是否与癌症发生有关？研究人员评估了设备监控、VILPA 与癌症之间的关系https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Does-vigorous-intermittent-lifestyle-physical-activity-have-an-association-with-incident-cancer-among-nonexercising-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Does-vigorous-intermittent-lifestyle-physical-activity-have-an-association-with-incident-cancer-among-nonexercising-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c829ac4d-5edd-4bc6-b949-95153a9ccc52 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 10:38:00 -0400 Does vigorous intermittent lifestyle physical activity have an association with incident cancer among nonexercising adults?
研究评估了早期 COVID-19 感染的预测生物标志物的价值研究人员表明，某些生物标志物可能比其他生物标志物更能预测 COVID-19。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Study-asseses-the-value-of-predictive-biomarkers-for-early-stage-COVID-19-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Study-asseses-the-value-of-predictive-biomarkers-for-early-stage-COVID-19-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66a85794-b4c1-4f4e-895c-81112338d9b4 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 10:29:00 -0400 Study assesses the value of predictive biomarkers for early-stage COVID-19 infection
回顾维生素 E 摄入量或循环 α-生育酚与各种健康结果之间关系的研究在最近的一项研究中，研究人员利用荟萃分析研究了维生素 E 或循环 α-生育酚摄入量与健康结果之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Review-studies-relationships- Between-vitamin-E-intake-or-circulate-ceb1-tocopherol-and-various-health-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Review-studies-relationships- Between-vitamin-E-intake-or-circulate-ceb1-tocopherol-and-various-health-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7dd66e0a-8cc8-402d-a2c7-b0a3bde4affe Wed, 02 Aug 2023 10:24:00 -0400 Review studies relationships between vitamin E intake or circulating α-tocopherol and various health outcomes
研究显示，数百万女性面临长期堕胎的困境根据截至 2023 年 6 月 2 日的数据研究，多布斯判决一年后，41.8% 的美国育龄妇女必须开车 30 分钟或更长时间才能到达堕胎护理机构。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Millions-of-women-face-long-drives-to-get-abortions-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Millions-of-women-face-long-drives-to-get-abortions-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f65dfb07-340d-4bd8-bc69-c9811f383735 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 10:20:14 -0400 Millions of women face long drives to get abortions, study shows

与针对医学上可行的儿科疾病的基因组相比，通过基因组测序筛查健康儿童是否具有临床价值？研究人员比较了主动基因组测序和医学上可行的基因组在识别健康新生儿和儿童中儿科发病疾病的潜在风险方面的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Is-there-clinical-value-in-screening-healthy-children-with-genome-sequencing-compared-with-a-gene-panel-for-医疗可行的儿科病症.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Is-there-clinical-value-in-screening-healthy-children-with-genome-sequencing-compared-with-a-gene-panel-for-医学上可行的儿科条件.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe2e46bd-9103-4cc2-affe-e6e875c6783b Wed, 02 Aug 2023 10:10:00 -0400 Is there clinical value in screening healthy children with genome sequencing compared with a gene panel for medically actionable pediatric conditions?
研究表明，COVID-19 大流行期间的人员短缺给疗养院带来了压力在最近的一项研究中，研究人员定性研究了 COVID-19 大流行期间美国疗养院的人员短缺情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Study-suggests-staffing-shortages-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic-placed-strain-on-nursing-homes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Study-suggests-staffing-shortages-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic-placed-strain-on-nursing-homes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=811c9421-ed08-4b04-a9ff-99a2e2303271 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 09:50:00 -0400 Study suggests staffing shortages during the COVID-19 pandemic placed strain on nursing homes
医学界的女性在多大程度上改变怀孕时间并调整职业轨迹以适应为人父母和职业生涯？有多少医学界女性为了成为母亲而改变职业轨迹或推迟怀孕。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/To-what-extent-do-women-in-medicine-alter-the-timing-of-pregnancy-and-modify-career-trajectories-to-适应-父母身份和职业.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/To-what-extent-do-women-in-medicine-alter-the-timing-of-pregnancy-and-modify-career-trajectories-to-适应-父母身份-和-职业.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7668f04-6fa2-4054-91e1-d1058acfecfd Wed, 02 Aug 2023 09:50:00 -0400 To what extent do women in medicine alter the timing of pregnancy and modify career trajectories to accommodate parenthood and career?
